articles.author: Katie Lobosco, CNN Photographs by Austin Steele
articles.title: Here's what it would mean to these Americans if Biden canceled student loan debt - CNN
articles.description: About 43 million people are waiting to find out if President Joe Biden will wipe away all or part of their federal student loan debt. CNN spoke with eight former college students about what it would mean for them if Biden canceled some student loan debt.
articles.content:
About 43 million people are waiting to find out if President Joe Biden will wipe away all or part of their federal student loan debt.
